title: Delhi Raises Minimum Wages: Unskilled Workers to Receive Rs 18,456, Skilled Rs 22,411
summary: The Delhi government has announced a significant increase in minimum wages for workers across different skill categories. Unskilled workers will now receive Rs 18,456 monthly, while skilled workers' wages have been raised to Rs 22,411.
content:
The Delhi government has implemented a new minimum wage structure across various worker categories. Under the revised rates, unskilled workers will receive a monthly minimum wage of Rs 18,456, while skilled workers will earn Rs 22,411.

This wage revision represents the government's effort to ensure fair compensation for workers in the national capital region. The new rates are expected to benefit thousands of workers across different sectors of Delhi's economy.

markdown_content:
## Wage Rate Revision

The Delhi government has implemented a new minimum wage structure across various worker categories. Under the revised rates, unskilled workers will receive a monthly minimum wage of Rs 18,456, while skilled workers will earn Rs 22,411.

This wage revision represents the government's effort to ensure fair compensation for workers in the national capital region. The new rates are expected to benefit thousands of workers across different sectors of Delhi's economy.
